alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 26 at 2:19PM CDT until August 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS, NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI AND SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 9 AM to 8 PM CDT Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...Ashley and Chicot in Arkansas. Bolivar, Sunflower, Leflore, Washington, Humphreys, Covington and Jones in Mississippi. * WIND...Variable in direction up to 10 mph with gusts up to 15 to 20 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 to 30 percent, especially in southeastern Mississippi. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will create explosive fire growth potential.
